REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0009 reute u f BC-N.Z.-77-DAY-T-BILLS-Y 04-07 0077

TEXT.TITLE: N.Z. 77-DAY T-BILLS YIELD 24.97 PCT AT TENDER
TEXT.BODY: The weighted average yield for 50 mln N.Z. Dlrs of 77-day Treasury bills sold in this week's regular weekly tender was 24.97 pct, the Reserve Bank said. The weighted average yield on 30 mln dlrs of 56-day bill was 25.50 pct, it said in a statement. No comparable bills have been offered recently. Bids totalling 379 mln dlrs were received for the 80 mln dlrs of bills on offer. REUTER
